about_the_game:
Soundtrack from Half Past Disaster:

Tracks:

1. Half Past Disaster (Menu Menu Theme) 1:20

2. Dino Dash (Jurassic Theme) 2:02

3. Cold Feet (Ice Theme) 1:37

4. Mirage (Sand Theme) 2:56

5. Starry Skies (Medieval Theme) 2:43

6. Salt and Rum (Pirate Theme) 2:56

7. Hustle and Bustle (City Theme) 3:04

8. Out of Time (Future Theme) 3:48

9. Moment of Calm (Cutscene Theme) 0:55

10. Overtime (Boss Theme) 2:25



All music composed by Lucas Mayor & Akira McGushin-Deak for Half Past Disaster
